code: import axios from"axios";var baseURL='https://cryptic-earth-64102.herokuapp.com/api/persons';var getAll=function getAll(){var request=axios.get(baseURL);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var create=function create(newObj){return axios.post(baseURL,newObj).then(function(response){return response.data;});};var remove=function remove(id){console.log("clicked for phone no"+id);axios.delete(baseURL+'/'+id);};var update=function update(newObj){return axios.put(baseURL+'/'+newObj.id,newObj).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,remove:remove,update:update};
